short_summary: The Department of Fisheries and Oceans - Canadian Coast Guard has a requirement for the provision of Steel Spar Buoys for use in the Atlantic Region.
full_summary:
### Steel Spar Buoys Tender Notice #

#### Title:
F7232-235004 - Steel Spar Buoys

#### Reference and Solicitation Numbers:
*   Reference Number: WS4288687563-Doc4288736117
*   Solicitation Number: WS4288687563

#### Tender Information:

| Tender Title | Date | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| F7232-235004 - Steel Spar Buoys | *Publication Date:* 2023-11-02 | Invite solicitation for provision of Steel Spar Buoys for the Department of Fisheries and Oceans - Canadian Coast Guard |
| F7232-235004 - Bouées espars en acier | *Publication Date:* 2023-11-02 | Invitation de soumission pour la fourniture de bouées espars en acier pour la Garde côtière canadienne du ministère des Pêches et des Océans du Canada |

#### Tender Details:

*   *Tender Closing Date:* 2023-12-05T14:00:00
*   *Amendment Date:* 2023-11-29
*   This tender notice is *Expired*

#### UNSPSC Codes:

*   11171500 - Basic steels
*   11171600 - Stainless steel alloys
*   30103618 - Steel framework
*   30263600 - Carbon steel bars
*   30264000 - Carbon steel sheets
*   30264200 - Specialty steel sheets
*   30264500 - Stainless steel bars
*   30264600 - Stainless steel sheets
*   40181800 - Welded steel tubes
*   40181900 - Welded stainless steel tubes
*   41115500 - Sound generating and measuring equipment

#### Contact Information:

*   *LeBlanc, Kristelle (SPAC/PSPC)*

Please note that security stamps, seals, or other means of authenticity are not provided, and we are relying on the official listing on the government's website for authenticity. End User Entities: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
